amendment.description: To provide for eligibility for retired pay for non-regular service.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2473 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 59. Record Vote Number: 315.

action.text: Amendment SA 2473 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Durbin.
Amendment SA 2473 was modified to reflect a first degree amendment by Unanimous Consent.
Amendment SA 2473 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Durbin to amendment SA 2433. (consideration: CR S12569-12571) To provide for eligibility for retired pay for non-regular service.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2473 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 59. Record Vote Number: 315.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2473 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 59. Record Vote Number: 315.
